item.title: 在繁忙的央行和数据密集的一周之前，美元维持在略低于 150 日元的水平
item.description:
The U.S. dollar eased a touch on Monday, and the yen managed to stay on the stronger side of 150 per dollar, as traders looked ahead to several major central bank meetings and a slew of economic data releases this week.翻译:美元周一小幅回落，日元兑美元汇率维持在 150 美元兑 150 元的强势区间，交易员展望本周的几场主要央行会议和一系列经济数据的发布。

The Bank of Japan (BOJ) kicked off its two-day monetary policy meeting on Monday, leading a week that will also see interest rate decisions from the U.S. Federal Reserve and the Bank of England (BoE).翻译:日本央行（BOJ）周一开始为期两天的货币政策会议，本周美联储和英国央行（BoE）也将做出利率决定。

A deluge of purchasing managers' surveys, euro zone inflation and GDP data, and U.S. nonfarm payrolls at the end of the week will also be competing for the top of traders' minds.翻译:大量采购经理人调查、欧元区通胀和国内生产总值数据以及本周末的美国非农就业数据也将争夺交易者的注意力。

"It is another busy week for FX markets, with important central bank meetings taking place around the world and some top-tier macro data too, said Chris Turner global head of markets at ING in a morning note.翻译:荷兰国际集团(ING)全球市场主管克里斯·特纳(Chris Turner)在早间报告中表示，“对于外汇市场来说，这又是忙碌的一周，世界各地将举行重要的央行会议，还有一些顶级宏观数据。”

"On paper, there should not be enough out there to knock the dollar's dominance this week, but focus on the U.S. quarterly refunding could throw some curveballs."翻译:“从表面上看，本周应该没有足够的因素来冲击美元的主导地位，但对美国季度退款的关注可能会引发一些问题。”

That funding announcement comes as mounting deficits and a heavier interest rate burden have substantially increased the U.S. Treasury's funding needs. Since the last refunding announcement in August, borrowing rates have spiralled to their highest since 2006-07.翻译:这一融资公告是在不断增加的赤字和较重的利率负担大幅增加美国财政部的融资需求之际发布的。自8月份最后一次退款公告以来，借款利率已飙升至2006-07年以来的最高水平。

The dollar index was last down 0.14% at 106.45, hurt by a small pick up in the euro , which gained 0.17% to $1.05835.翻译:美元指数最后下跌0.14%至106.45，受到欧元小幅回升的影响，欧元上涨0.17%至1.05835美元。

The common currency has had a quiet October, and still is not far off a 10-month low of $1.0448 hit at the start of the month.翻译:欧元在 10 月份表现平静，距离本月初触及的 10 个月低点 1.0448 美元仍然不远。

In the mix in Europe on Monday was cooling German state inflation data, which pointed to slowing headline inflation in the euro zone's largest economy, and a separate release showing German gross domestic product fell by 0.1% quarter on quarter, though this was above expectations.翻译:周一欧洲方面，德国国家通胀数据降温，该数据表明欧元区最大经济体的整体通胀放缓，另外一份单独发布的数据显示，德国国内生产总值环比下降 0.1%，不过高于预期。

CENTRAL BANKS

Of the three central bank meetings, the BOJ's is attracting the most scrutiny from investors given heightened speculation over a policy tweak.翻译:在三场央行会议中，鉴于对政策调整的猜测加剧，日本央行吸引了投资者最密切的关注。

A recent surge in global interest rates has heightened pressure on the BOJ to change its bond yield control policy, as speculation mounts that the central bank could hike its existing yield cap at this week's meeting.翻译:近期全球利率飙升加大了日本央行改变债券收益率控制政策的压力，因为市场猜测央行可能会在本周的会议上提高现有收益率上限。

The Fed and BoE are both expected to keep rates steady so, barring any surprises, the focus will be more around the message the policymakers communicate.翻译:预计美联储和英国央行都将保持利率稳定，因此，除非出现任何意外，焦点将更多地围绕政策制定者传达的信息。

The yen was little changed at 149.75 per dollar, getting a slight reprieve after having struck a one-year trough of 150.78 per dollar last week.翻译:日元兑美元汇率几乎没有变化，为149.75日元兑美元，在上周触及150.78日元兑美元的一年低点后略有缓解。

The pound was steady at $1.2125 .翻译:英镑兑美元稳定在1.2125美元。

U.S. nonfarm payrolls data on Friday will also be important for expectations of the Fed's rate hike path.翻译:周五的美国非农就业数据对于美联储加息路径的预期也很重要。

"October’s jobs report takes on added importance on the back of September’s dramatic outcome, when net of revisions the cumulative payroll gain was 455k. The report will help to determine whether September was more signal or noise," said BNP Paribas analysts in a note.翻译:法国巴黎银行分析师在一份报告中表示：“在 9 月份的惊人结果的背景下，10 月份的就业报告变得更加重要，扣除修正后，累计就业人数增加了 45.5 万。该报告将有助于确定 9 月份的信号更多还是噪音更多。”

"We expect a 190k payroll print - still sturdy but not compellingly pointing to reacceleration. However, another firm print would likely see long-end yields increase further as the market reassess the degree of policy-rate restriction and inflation expectations rise," the note added.翻译:“我们预计就业人数将达到 19 万，仍然强劲，但不会令人信服地表明经济将重新加速。然而，随着市场重新评估政策利率限制程度和通胀预期上升，另一份稳定的就业人数可能会导致长期收益率进一步上升。”添加。

Reporting by Rae Wee in Singapore and Alun John in London; Editing by Miral Fahmy and Mark Potter翻译:Rae Wee 在新加坡和 Alun John 在伦敦的报道；米拉尔·法赫米和马克·波特编辑

item.title: 俄罗斯的弱势削弱了西伯利亚力量2号与中国天然气连接的理由
item.description:
Summary:
  • Russia is bolstering ties with East翻译:俄罗斯正在加强与东方的关系
  • Power of Siberia-2 to supply 50 bcm of gas per year翻译:Siberia-2 每年供应 50 bcm 天然气
  • Talks on the link have been protracted翻译:关于该链接的谈判已旷日持久
  • Russia competes with Turkmenistan, LNG suppliers翻译:俄罗斯与土库曼斯坦液化天然气供应商竞争

Russia is counting on a planned new pipeline to China as it seeks to make up for lost gas sales in Europe, but industry insiders see major risks around the project and question whether it will justify the huge costs.翻译:俄罗斯正指望计划修建一条通往中国的新管道，以弥补欧洲天然气销售的损失，但业内人士认为该项目存在重大风险，并质疑其巨额成本是否合理。

Russia has been in talks for years about building the Power of Siberia-2 to carry 50 billion cubic metres of natural gas a year from the Yamal region in northern Russia to China via Mongolia - almost as much as the now idle Nord Stream 1 pipeline under the Baltic Sea that was damaged by explosions last year.翻译:俄罗斯多年来一直在讨论建设西伯利亚力量2号管道，每年从俄罗斯北部的亚马尔地区经蒙古向中国输送500亿立方米天然气——几乎与目前闲置的北溪1号管道一样多。去年因爆炸而受损的波罗的海。

The plan has gained urgency as Moscow aims to double its gas exports to energy-hungry China to make up for the collapse of its exports to Europe following the war in Ukraine. But agreement on key issues including pricing remains elusive.翻译:由于莫斯科计划将其对能源匮乏的中国的天然气出口增加一倍，以弥补乌克兰战争后对欧洲出口的崩溃，因此该计划变得更加紧迫。但在包括定价在内的关键问题上仍难以达成一致。

China's President Xi Jinping told Russian President Vladimir Putin in Beijing this month that he hoped the China-Mongolia-Russia gas pipeline will make substantive progress as soon as possible, yet nothing has been formally agreed between the two countries.翻译:中国国家主席习近平本月在北京对俄罗斯总统普京表示，希望中蒙俄天然气管道尽快取得实质性进展，但两国之间尚未达成任何正式协议。

Russia currently exports gas to China through the Power of Siberia 1 pipeline, which began operating in 2019 and runs through eastern Siberia into China's northeastern Heilongjiang province.翻译:俄罗斯目前通过西伯利亚力量1号管道向中国出口天然气，该管道于2019年开始运营，穿过东西伯利亚进入中国东北部的黑龙江省。

Experts say that as China is not expected to need additional gas supply until after 2030 Beijing could drive a hard bargain on price for a second pipeline via Siberia.翻译:专家表示，预计中国在2030 年之后才需要额外的天然气供应，北京方面可能会就途经西伯利亚的第二条管道的价格进行艰难的讨价还价。

Moscow has not said how much the 2,600 km (1,616 miles) Power of Siberia-2 would cost or how it would be financed. Some analysts have put the cost at up to $13.6 billion.翻译:莫斯科尚未透露全长 2,600 公里（1,616 英里）的西伯利亚力量 2 号工程的成本或融资方式。一些分析师估计成本高达 136 亿美元。

"There are too many risks, not least political ones. It's too dangerous to depend on a single buyer which may change its decision to buy the product from you any time," said a Russian industry source familiar with the talks.翻译:“风险太多，尤其是政治风险。依赖单一买家太危险了，因为他可能随时改变从你那里购买产品的决定，”一位熟悉谈判的俄罗斯行业消息人士表示。

Russia aims to increase supplies via Power of Siberia 1 to 38 bcm annually by 2025.翻译:俄罗斯的目标是到 2025 年通过西伯利亚力量每年将供应量增加 1 至 38 bcm。

If the plans for Power of Siberia 2 and another link from Russia's far eastern island of Sakhalin come to fruition, Russia's pipeline gas exports to China would rise to almost 100 bcm per year by 2030.翻译:如果西伯利亚力量2号和俄罗斯远东萨哈林岛的另一条线路的计划能够实现，到2030年，俄罗斯对中国的管道天然气出口量将增至每年近100立方厘米。

That's around half of Russia's annual exports to Europe at the peak reached in 2018 and compared to a combined capacity of 110 bcm of Nord Stream 1 and 2.翻译:这大约是俄罗斯在 2018 年达到峰值时对欧洲的年出口量的一半，而北溪 1 号和 2 号的总容量为 110 bcm。

Russia, however, expects the price of its pipeline gas for China to steadily decline over the next few years, according to a government document, and be much lower than prices for sales to Europe - which before the war in Ukraine accounted for 80% of Russian gas exports.翻译:然而，根据一份政府文件，俄罗斯预计其输往中国的管道天然气价格将在未来几年稳步下降，并远低于输往欧洲的价格——在乌克兰战争之前，欧洲输往欧洲的价格占俄罗斯出口天然气总量的80%。俄罗斯天然气出口。

The Russian economy ministry has not responded to a request for comment on the document published last month.翻译:俄罗斯经济部尚未回应对上个月发布的文件发表评论的请求。

The document sees the price of Russian pipeline gas for Turkey and Europe falling to an average $501.60 per 1,000 cubic metres this year and to $481.70 in 2024 from $983.80 in 2022.翻译:该文件预计，今年俄罗斯输往土耳其和欧洲的管道天然气平均价格将从 2022 年的 983.80 美元降至每 1000 立方米 501.60 美元，并于 2024 年降至 481.70 美元。

For China, it expects the price to average $297.30 in 2023 and $271.60 in 2024.翻译:对于中国来说，预计 2023 年平均价格为 297.30 美元，2024 年平均价格为 271.60 美元。

DEPENDENT ON ONE BUYER

Russia said in March that state gas giant Gazprom (GAZP.MM), which will operate Power of Siberia-2, was finalising contract terms with China's top oil and gas major CNPC.翻译:俄罗斯3月份表示，将运营西伯利亚力量2号项目的国有天然气巨头俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司(Gazprom)正在与中国最大的石油和天然气巨头中石油敲定合同条款。

Gazprom began a feasibility study on the project in 2020 and has said it aims to start delivering gas by 2030. It did not reply to a request for comment on the cost of the project.翻译:俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司于 2020 年开始对该项目进行可行性研究，并表示目标是到 2030 年开始供应天然气。该公司没有回复对该项目成本的置评请求。

Dmitry Kondratov from the Economics Institute at the Russian Academy of Science, said the project is also undermined by extra costs related to the need to transport gas across China to end-users once the gas reaches China.翻译:俄罗斯科学院经济研究所的德米特里·康德拉托夫表示，一旦天然气到达中国，需要将天然气穿越中国运送给最终用户，因此产生额外成本，从而影响了该项目。

"Transportation costs for the Chinese side... will be approximately $270 per 1,000 cubic metres, therefore, if the Russian side does not provide price discounts, then the prospects for the construction of this gas pipeline until 2030 remain quite pessimistic," he wrote in a note this month.翻译:他写道：“中方的运输成本……约为每1000立方米270美元，因此，如果俄方不提供价格折扣，那么到2030年这条天然气管道的建设前景仍然相当悲观。”在本月的一份笔记中。

"This fact will require CNPC to build on its own all the necessary gas transportation infrastructure in China," Kondratov wrote.翻译:康德拉托夫写道：“这一事实要求中石油在中国自行建设所有必要的天然气运输基础设施。”

Sergey Vakulenko, non-resident fellow at the Carnegie Endowment for International Peace, said the project might "leave Gazprom in the red after transportation costs".翻译:卡内基国际和平基金会非常驻研究员谢尔盖·瓦库连科表示，该项目可能“导致俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司在扣除运输成本后出现亏损”。

"It will also make Gazprom dangerously dependent on one buyer, which will be able to not only dictate the terms of the contract, but also demand changes to those terms in future," Vakulenko, who has experience of working for Gazprom companies, wrote in a note in June.翻译:拥有在俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司工作经验的瓦库连科在《俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司》中写道：“这也将使俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司危险地依赖于一个买家，该买家不仅能够决定合同条款，而且还可以要求未来修改这些条款。”六月的一张笔记。

Russian Deputy Prime Minister Viktoria Abramchenko was quoted as saying this month that construction on the Soyuz Vostok gas pipeline, the Mongolian portion of Power of Siberia-2, could start in the first half of next year.翻译:俄罗斯副总理维多利亚·阿布拉姆琴科本月表示，联盟东方天然气管道（西伯利亚力量2号的蒙古部分）的建设可能于明年上半年开始。

In February 2022, Beijing also agreed to buy gas from Russia's Sakhalin island, to be transported via a new pipeline across the Japan Sea to China's Heilongjiang province, reaching up to 10 bcm a year later this decade.翻译:2022年2月，北京还同意从俄罗斯萨哈林岛购买天然气，通过一条横跨日本海的新管道输送到中国黑龙江省，本十年后每年输送量将达到10 bcm。

But Russia is also jostling with other competitors to sell gas to China, including Turkmenistan and providers of sea-borne liquefied natural gas from the United States, Qatar and Australia - further strengthening Beijing's bargaining power.翻译:但俄罗斯也在与其他竞争对手争夺向中国出售天然气，包括土库曼斯坦以及来自美国、卡塔尔和澳大利亚的海上液化天然气供应商，这进一步增强了北京的议价能力。

Additional reporting by Andrew Hayley in Beijing, Chen Aizhu in Singapore and Oksana Kobzeva in Moscow; Editing by Mark Trevelyan and Susan Fenton翻译:安德鲁·海利 (Andrew Hayley) 北京、陈爱珠 (Chen Aizhu) 新加坡和奥克萨娜·科布泽娃 (Oksana Kobzeva) 莫斯科的补充报道；马克·特里维廉和苏珊·芬顿编辑

item.title: 由于对中东供应的担忧缓解，油价下跌超过 1%
item.description:
Summary:
  • Oil retreats after 3% rally on Friday翻译:周五油价上涨 3% 后回落
  • Developments in Middle East yet to impact oil supplies翻译:中东事态发展尚未影响石油供应
  • Fed, BoE and BOJ all hold meetings this week翻译:美联储、英国央行和日本央行本周均召开会议

Oil slipped more than 1% on Monday as concern eased about the Israel-Hamas war affecting supply from the region and as investors adopted caution ahead of this week's U.S. Federal Reserve meeting and other indications of global economic health.翻译:周一油价下跌逾 1%，原因是对影响该地区供应的以色列-哈马斯战争的担忧有所缓解，且投资者在本周美联储会议和全球经济健康状况的其他迹象之前采取了谨慎态度。

Crude had jumped 3% on Friday after Israel stepped up ground incursions into Gaza, stoking worries the conflict could expand in a region that accounts for a third of global oil output. However, that concern was fading on Monday, analysts said.翻译:以色列加大对加沙的地面入侵力度后，周五原油价格上涨 3%，引发了人们对冲突可能在这个占全球石油产量三分之一的地区扩大的担忧。然而，分析师表示，这种担忧周一正在消退。

"There is a propensity for market users in all their guises to have at least some oil length going into the weekends and when the fear of conflict spread shows no validation come the early hours of Monday mornings' openings, that fear hedge is ordinarily unwound," said John Evans of oil broker PVM.翻译:“市场用户倾向于在周末至少持有一定程度的石油头寸，而当对冲突蔓延的恐惧在周一早上开盘时并未得到证实时，恐惧对冲通常会解除， ”石油经纪商 PVM 的约翰·埃文斯 (John Evans) 说道。

Brent crude futures dropped 95 cents, or 1.1%, to $89.53 a barrel by 1217 GMT, while U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude was down $1.12, or 1.3%, at $84.42.翻译:截至格林威治标准时间 1217 年，布伦特原油期货下跌 95 美分，跌幅 1.1%，至每桶 89.53 美元，而美国西德克萨斯中质原油期货下跌 1.12 美元，跌幅 1.3%，至每桶 84.42 美元。

"Despite an escalation in the Hamas-Israel war, the ground invasion was widely expected," said CMC Markets analyst Tina Teng. "The weekend playout signals no further expansion into a wider regional war, which caused a retreat in oil prices."翻译:CMC Markets分析师蒂娜·滕（Tina Teng）表示：“尽管哈马斯与以色列的战争升级，但人们普遍预计会发生地面入侵。” “周末的局势表明，地区战争不会进一步扩大，导致油价下跌。”

On Monday, Palestinians in northern Gaza reported fierce air and artillery strikes as Israeli troops backed by tanks pressed into the enclave with a ground assault that spurred more international calls to protect civilians.翻译:周一，加沙北部的巴勒斯坦人报告说，以色列军队在坦克的支援下，对加沙地带发动地面攻击，遭到猛烈的空袭和炮击，这引发了更多国际社会呼吁保护平民。

As well as the Middle East, investors are focused on the outcome of Wednesday's Federal Reserve meeting as well as on what earnings from the likes of tech giant Apple Inc (AAPL.O) might indicate regarding the prospects for economic slowdown.翻译:除了中东，投资者还关注周三美联储会议的结果，以及科技巨头苹果公司(AAPL.O)等公司的财报可能预示的经济放缓前景。

The Fed is widely expected to keep interest rates unchanged, while the central banks of Britain and Japan are also set to review their policies.翻译:人们普遍预计美联储将维持利率不变，而英国和日本央行也将重新审视其政策。

China reports its October manufacturing and services PMIs this week, with investors looking out for more signs that the economy of the world's top crude importer is stabilising.翻译:中国本周将公布10月份制造业和服务业采购经理人指数，投资者正在寻找更多表明世界最大原油进口国经济正在企稳的迹象。

Additional reporting by Mohi Narayan and Florence Tan; editing by Jason Neely翻译:Mohi Narayan 和 Florence Tan 的补充报道；杰森·尼利编辑

item.title: 何立峰：中国经济沙皇出任党委主任
item.description:
China's economy tsar He Lifeng has been appointed director of a key ruling Communist Party economic body, matching his high-profile predecessor Liu He with a particularly powerful portfolio covering economic policy, the financial sector and trade ties with Washington.翻译:中国经济沙皇何立峰已被任命为执政的共产党一个重要经济机构的主任，与他备受瞩目的前任刘鹤一样，他在经济政策、金融部门以及与华盛顿的贸易关系方面拥有特别强大的权力。

He, who had previously headed the state planning agency, became one of China's four vice premiers in March when he replaced Liu He, who retired.翻译:曾任国家计划局局长的他今年三月接替退休的刘鹤，成为中国四位副总理之一。

He has now also replaced Liu as director of the office of the Central Finance and Economic Affairs Commission, a party body headed by President Xi Jinping.翻译:他现在还接替刘鹤担任中央财经委员会办公室主任，该委员会是由国家主席习近平领导的党内机构。

State media for the first time referred to He by his latest title in a readout of his meeting with a visiting French official on Sunday.翻译:官方媒体在周日宣读贺建奎与来访的法国官员会面的报道时，首次提及贺建奎的最新头衔。

Though regarded as a confidant of President Xi, He's ascent has surprised some analysts, who had expected Premier Li Qiang, former Shanghai party secretary, to take a bigger role in economic affairs.翻译:尽管被视为习近平主席的心腹，但贺建奎的崛起让一些分析人士感到惊讶，他们原本预计前上海市委书记、总理李强将在经济事务中发挥更大作用。

Since taking over the economic portfolio, He has met with U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen and EU Trade Commissioner Valdis Dombrovskis, and last week accompanied Xi on his first known visit to China's central bank.翻译:自接手经济事务以来，贺建奎会见了美国财政部长珍妮特·耶伦和欧盟贸易委员瓦尔迪斯·东布罗夫斯基斯，并于上周陪同习近平首次访问中国央行。

"He Lifeng is in the post to execute Xi's ideas but not to question him, as Liu He could," said an advisor who had sometimes sat in on briefings with both He and Liu, and spoke on condition of anonymity.翻译:“何立峰的职责是执行习近平的想法，但不会像刘鹤那样质疑他，”一位有时旁听何立峰和刘鹤的简报、不愿透露姓名的顾问表示。

The advisor also confirmed He does not speak English, unlike Liu, who studied economics at Harvard and was popular among U.S. officials because they could more easily converse with him.翻译:该顾问还证实，与刘不同，他不会说英语。刘在哈佛大学学习经济学，在美国官员中很受欢迎，因为他们可以更轻松地与他交谈。

Analysts also expect He will be named head of a new and even higher ranking party economic watchdog, once Xi revives the Central Financial Work Commission, which was was disbanded in 2003, having been set up in 1998 to build a role for the party within the central bank and financial regulators.翻译:分析人士还预计，一旦习近平重振中央金融工作委员会，贺建奎将被任命为一个新的、级别更高的党内经济监察机构的负责人。该委员会于 1998 年成立，旨在为党在经济领域发挥作用，该委员会于 2003 年被解散。中央银行和金融监管机构。

The world's second-largest economy grew faster than expected in the third quarter, though it is suffering from a domestic property crisis, high youth unemployment, depressed private sector confidence, and a slowdown in global growth.翻译:全球第二大经济体第三季度的增长快于预期，尽管它正遭受国内房地产危机、青年失业率高、私营部门信心低迷以及全球增长放缓的影响。

Policymakers have unveiled a raft of measures in recent weeks, but their ability to spur growth is constrained by fears over debt risks and a fragile yuan.翻译:政策制定者近几周公布了一系列措施，但刺激经济增长的能力受到债务风险和人民币脆弱的担忧的限制。

He could emerge as head of the resurrected Central Financial Work Commission, when state leaders, regulators and top bankers gather for a quinquennial, closed-door national financial work conference.翻译:当国家领导人、监管机构和顶级银行家齐聚召开五年一次的闭门全国金融工作会议时，他可能会成为复活后的中央金融工作委员会主席。

That meeting, which could set medium-term priorities for the broad financial industry, will take place in Beijing this week, Bloomberg News reported.翻译:据彭博社报道，该会议将于本周在北京举行，该会议可能会为整个金融业确定中期优先事项。

(This story has been refiled to change the characterization of role in paragraph 1)翻译:（这个故事已被重新归档以更改第1段中的角色特征）

item.title: 中俄在中国军事论坛上瞄准美国
item.description:
Chinese and Russian military chiefs targeted the United States for criticism at a security forum in Beijing on Monday, even as China's second most senior military commander vowed to boost defence ties with Washington.翻译:中国和俄罗斯军事领导人周一在北京的一个安全论坛上批评美国，尽管中国第二高级军事指挥官发誓要加强与华盛顿的防务关系。

The lack of regular communications between the U.S. and Chinese militaries has been a worry for Washington as tensions rise over various issues and given the risks of an accidental clash in the South China Sea or near Taiwan.翻译:随着各种问题的紧张局势加剧，以及南海或台湾附近发生意外冲突的风险，美国和中国军队之间缺乏定期沟通一直是华盛顿的担忧。

The Xiangshan Forum, China's biggest annual show of military diplomacy, began on Sunday without a Chinese defence minister, who typically hosts the event, but including a U.S. delegation.翻译:香山论坛是中国最大的年度军事外交秀，周日开幕，但没有中国国防部长出席，通常由国防部长主持，但其中包括美国代表团。

Russian Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu warned the West that its involvement in the Ukraine war created grave danger.翻译:俄罗斯国防部长绍伊古警告西方，其卷入乌克兰战争造成了严重危险。

"The Western line of steady escalation of the conflict with Russia carries the threat of a direct military clash between nuclear powers, which is fraught with catastrophic consequences," Russia's TASS state news agency cited Shoigu as saying at the forum.翻译:俄罗斯塔斯社国家通讯社援引绍伊古在论坛上的话说：“西方与俄罗斯的冲突不断升级，带来了核大国之间直接军事冲突的威胁，这将带来灾难性后果。”

Shoigu said the West intended to inflict "strategic defeat" on Russia in what he called a "hybrid war", and praised Russia-China relations as "exemplary", Russian state media reported.翻译:据俄罗斯官方媒体报道，绍伊古表示，西方打算在他所谓的“混合战争”中对俄罗斯造成“战略失败”，并称赞俄中关系是“典范”。

Zhang Youxia, vice chairman, under President Xi Jinping, of China's Central Military Commission, delivered veiled criticism of the United States and its allies, accusing "some countries" of trying to undermine China's government.翻译:中国国家主席习近平领导下的中央军委副主席张又侠对美国及其盟国进行了含蓄的批评，指责“一些国家”试图破坏中国政府。

But Zhang also stressed the need for improving military ties with the United States.翻译:但张也强调有必要改善与美国的军事关系。

"We will deepen strategic cooperation and coordination with Russia and are willing to, on the basis of mutual respect, peaceful coexistence and win-win cooperation, develop military ties with the U.S.," Zhang said in an address closely watched by military attaches and diplomats.翻译:张在受武官和外交官密切关注的讲话中说：“我们将深化与俄罗斯的战略合作与协调，并愿意在相互尊重、和平共处、合作共赢的基础上发展与美国的军事关系。” 。

Zhang held talks with Shoigu on the sidelines of the forum, China's Xinhua state media reported.翻译:据中国官方媒体新华社报道，张在论坛期间与绍伊古举行了会谈。

China's defence minister has in previous years delivered the forum's keynote speech but Li Shangfu was sacked as defence minister last week without explanation and a replacement has not been named.翻译:中国国防部长往年都曾在论坛上发表过主旨演讲，但李尚福上周在没有任何解释的情况下被解除国防部长职务，接替者也尚未任命。

Reuters reported last month that Li, who has been missing for two months, was being investigated over corruption.翻译:路透社上个月报道称，失踪两个月的李正因腐败问题接受调查。

China and the U.S. have had no high-level military-to-military communications since the Washington-sanctioned Li was appointed in March.翻译:自三月份华盛顿批准的李克强上任以来，中美两国一直没有进行过高层军事交流。

'HERE AND LISTENING'

The U.S. defence department has sent a delegation led by Cynthia Xanthi Carras, China country director in the Office of the Undersecretary of Defense.翻译:美国国防部派出由国防部副部长办公室中国国家主任辛西娅·克桑西·卡拉斯率领的代表团。

Carras had a brief exchange with defence ministry spokesperson Wu Qian at the forum, a social media account affiliated with state broadcaster CCTV reported.翻译:据央视旗下社交媒体账户报道，卡拉斯在论坛上与国防部发言人吴谦进行了简短交流。

Chad Spragia, a former U.S. deputy assistant secretary of defense for China, stressed the importance of U.S. participation.翻译:美国前负责中国事务的副助理国防部长查德·斯普拉贾强调了美国参与的重要性。

"It's important for the U.S. to be here and not cede the space to others. We're here and we're listening," said Sbragia, who said he was attending there in a research capacity.翻译:斯布拉吉亚说：“对美国来说，重要的是要在这里，不要把空间让给其他人。我们在这里，我们正在倾听。”他说，他是以研究身份参加会议的。

The participation of the U.S. delegation comes as the United States and China ramp up exchanges ahead of an expected summit between U.S. President Joe Biden and China's Xi next month.翻译:美国代表团出席之际，正值美国总统乔·拜登和中国习近平下个月举行峰会之前，美国和中国加强了交流。

Last week, China's top diplomat, Wang Yi, met Biden for an hour in talks the White House described as a "good opportunity" to keep open lines of communication between the two rivals.翻译:上周，中国最高外交官王毅与拜登进行了一个小时的会谈，白宫称这是在两个竞争对手之间保持开放沟通渠道的“好机会”。

Despite the conciliatory remarks about improving China-U.S. military ties, Zhang and some Chinese military officers gave no sign of a softer stance on issues such as Taiwan, which Beijing's regards as its territory.翻译:尽管发表了关于改善中美军事关系的和解言论，但张和一些中国军官在台湾等问题上没有表现出软化立场，北京将台湾视为其领土。

Chinese Lieutenant-General He Lei, speaking at a panel on Sunday, said that if China were to have to use force against Taiwan, "it will be a war for reunification, a just and legitimate war".翻译:中国中将何雷周日在一次小组会议上表示，如果中国不得不对台湾使用武力，“这将是一场争取统一的战争，一场正义合法的战争”。

In his speech, Zhang said that countries "should not deliberately provoke other countries on major and sensitive issues," he said, adding that Taiwan was "a core interest" for China.翻译:张在讲话中表示，各国“不应在重大敏感问题上刻意刺激其他国家”，并补充说台湾是中国的“核心利益”。

Many Western countries have either shunned the forum or are only sending low-level delegations.翻译:许多西方国家要么回避这个论坛，要么只派出低级别代表团。

Reporting by Yew Lun Tian and Beijing newsroom; Additional reporting by Lidia Kelly in Sydney; Writing by Laurie Chen and Greg Torode; Editing by Gerry Doyle and Tom Hogue翻译:游伦天和北京新闻编辑室报道；莉迪亚·凯利 (Lidia Kelly) 在悉尼的补充报道；劳里·陈 (Laurie Chen) 和格雷格·托罗德 (Greg Torode) 撰写；格里·多伊尔和汤姆·霍格编辑

item.title: 汇丰银行表示，第三季度利润令人失望，中国房地产业已迎来最糟糕的时期
item.description:
Summary:
  • Q3 pretax profit more than doubles to $7.7 bln翻译:第三季度税前利润翻了一倍多，达到 77 亿美元
  • Rising interest rates lift profit, but costs increase翻译:利率上升提升利润，但成本增加
  • Investment banking outperforms Barclays; books new wealth flows翻译:投资银行业务表现优于巴克莱银行；书籍新的财富流动

The worst may be over for China's shaky commercial real estate market, HSBC (HSBA.L) said on Monday, as a further $500 million charge from the sector helped drag third quarter profits at Europe's biggest bank below market forecasts.翻译:汇丰银行(HSBA.L)周一表示，中国摇摇欲坠的商业房地产市场最糟糕的时期可能已经过去，该行业进一步收取 5 亿美元费用，导致这家欧洲最大银行第三季度利润低于市场预期。

While HSBC announced a new $3 billion share buyback and said profits for July-September more than doubled amid higher interest rates, its shares reacted with a shrug as investors took in the China impairment and increased cost forecasts.翻译:尽管汇丰银行宣布进行新的 30 亿美元股票回购，并表示 7 月至 9 月的利润在利率上升的情况下增加了一倍多，但由于投资者考虑到中国经济减值和成本预测的提高，其股价反应平平。

"I do think the major correction (in China's property market) is over and it's now a case of a progressive work over an extended period of time," HSBC Chief Executive Noel Quinn told reporters.翻译:汇丰银行首席执行官诺埃尔·奎因(Noel Quinn)对记者表示：“我确实认为（中国房地产市场）的重大调整已经结束，现在是一个长期的渐进工作的情况。”

Fears about the debt-laden sector have weighed on foreign banks that lend to developers in China, especially after rival Standard Chartered (STAN.L) reported an unexpected plunge in profit due to a nearly $1 billion hit from real estate and banking.翻译:对负债累累的行业的担忧给向中国开发商提供贷款的外资银行造成了压力，特别是在竞争对手渣打银行(STAN.L)报告称，由于房地产和银行业遭受近10亿美元的打击，利润意外暴跌之后。

All eyes are on China's embattled property giant Evergrande Group (3333.HK) which has more than $300 billion of liabilities after it defaulted on its offshore debt in late 2021.翻译:所有的目光都集中在陷入困境的中国房地产巨头恒大集团（3333.HK） ，该公司在 2021 年底违约海外债务后负债超过 3000 亿美元。

Hong Kong's High Court said on Monday the next hearing on Dec. 4 would be the last before a decision is made on liquidating the company.翻译:香港高等法院周一表示，12 月 4 日举行的下一次听证会将是就公司清算做出决定之前的最后一次听证会。

HSBC finance chief Georges Elhedery said the bank still expected "a couple of quarters of difficulty as the sector adjusts," but that the longer term outlook was more positive.翻译:汇丰银行首席财务官Georges Elhedery表示，该行仍预计“随着该行业的调整，将出现几个季度的困难”，但长期前景更为乐观。

Commenting on HSBC's exposure to China, Hargreaves Lansdown equity analyst Matt Britzman said: "There’s still a cloud of uncertainty hovering over the market, but investors will be happy to see no nasty surprises".翻译:Hargreaves Lansdown 股票分析师马特·布里茨曼 (Matt Britzman) 在评论汇丰银行对中国的投资时表示：“市场上仍然笼罩着不确定性的阴云，但投资者将很高兴看到不会出现令人不快的意外情况”。

The bank's overall results show the hurdles it faces in delivering the consistent returns its investors expect amid high inflation and pressure on borrowers, even as it showers them with cash from dividends and buybacks.翻译:该银行的总体业绩显示，在高通胀和借款人压力的情况下，它在提供投资者预期的持续回报方面面临障碍，尽管它向借款人提供了大量的股息和回购现金。

HSBC said costs would increase by up to 5% this year excluding the acquisition of Silicon Valley Bank's British unit, more than its previous goal of a 3% rise, as spending grows and it considers bigger bonuses for bankers in the fourth quarter.翻译:汇丰银行表示，由于支出增长，并且考虑在第四季度为银行家发放更多奖金，因此，如果不包括收购硅谷银行英国子公司的费用，今年的成本将增加最多 5%，超过其之前 3% 的增长目标。

The bank posted a pretax profit of $7.7 billion for the July to September quarter, versus $3.2 billion a year earlier, but the result trailed the $8.1 billion mean average estimate of brokers compiled by HSBC.翻译:该银行公布的 7 月至 9 月季度税前利润为 77 亿美元，而去年同期为 32 亿美元，但这一结果落后于汇丰银行编制的经纪商平均预期 81 亿美元。

"Costs are likely to be the area of controversy", said London-based Jefferies analyst Joe Dickerson, though he added the share buyback was $1 billion larger than his forecast.翻译:伦敦杰富瑞 (Jefferies) 分析师乔·迪克森 (Joe Dickerson) 表示，“成本可能是有争议的领域”，不过他补充说，股票回购比他的预测多出 10 亿美元。

The London-headquartered bank with a market value of $118.6 billion said it aimed to complete the share buyback by next February, lifting the total buybacks announced this year to $7 billion.翻译:这家总部位于伦敦、市值1186亿美元的银行表示，其目标是在明年2月之前完成股票回购，使今年宣布的回购总额达到70亿美元。

It also set the third interim dividend this year at 10 cents per share, bringing the total annual payout so far to 30 cents per share.翻译:它还将今年的第三次中期股息定为每股10美分，使迄今为止的年度派息总额达到每股30美分。

HSBC shares in London were broadly flat, underperforming a 0.7% gain in the benchmark FTSE 100 index (.FTSE).翻译:汇丰银行在伦敦的股价基本持平，表现落后于基准富时 100 指数(.FTSE) 0.7% 的涨幅。

Third-quarter revenues rose 2% in HSBC's Global Banking and Markets division that houses its investment bank, a more robust performance than rival Barclays' BARC.L 6% drop, as HSBC's large payments business benefited from higher interest rates.翻译:汇丰银行旗下投资银行业务的全球银行和市场部门第三季度收入增长了 2%，比竞争对手巴克莱银行 BARC.L 下降 6% 的表现更加强劲，因为汇丰银行的大型支付业务受益于较高的利率。

The bank's wealth business, which it is prioritising for growth, attracted $34 billion of net new invested assets in the quarter and revenues have grown 12% so far this year as rate hikes let it reap bigger margins on lending.翻译:该银行优先发展的财富业务本季度吸引了 340 亿美元的净新投资资产，今年迄今为止收入增长了 12%，因为加息使其在贷款方面获得了更大的利润。

Reporting by Selena Li in Hong Kong and Lawrence White in London Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman and Mark Potter翻译:Selena Li 在香港和 Lawrence White 在伦敦的报道 Muralikumar Anantharaman 和 Mark Potter 编辑
item.author: Selena Li, Lawrence White

item.title: 早盘竞价：市场反弹为未来一周美联储主导奠定基础
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望

Another Monday bounce in world markets sets up a Fed-dominated week ahead - although the U.S. central bank may not yet have a great deal to offer stock and bond markets that seem keener to see the glass half empty as October comes to a close.翻译:世界市场周一的又一次反弹预示着未来一周将由美联储主导——尽管美联储可能尚未向股票和债券市场提供大量优惠，而随着十月即将结束，股票和债券市场似乎更渴望看到杯子半空。

A worrying late-year stock market unwind is starkest in small-cap indexes (.RUT) now tracking year-to-date losses of some 7% - even as the benchmark S&P500 (.SPX) remains up 7% and Big Tech leaders of the Nasdaq 100 are still 30% (.NDX) higher.翻译:令人担忧的年底股市下跌在小盘股指数(.RUT)中最为明显，目前年初至今已下跌约 7%，尽管基准 S&P500 (.SPX)仍上涨 7%，大型科技龙头企业纳斯达克 100 指数仍上涨 30% (.NDX) 。

Tech stocks gained on Friday (.IXIC), for example, even as the Russell 2000 lost more than 1% on the day to hit its lowest since 2020.翻译:例如，科技股周五(.IXIC)上涨，尽管罗素 2000 指数当天下跌超过 1%，触及 2020 年以来的最低水平。

Even though incoming third-quarter earnings seem like a mixed bag - mainly because of some large individual stock losses due to investors' high bar for 2024 outlooks - the aggregate actually looks quite impressive.翻译:尽管即将到来的第三季度收益看起来好坏参半——主要是因为投资者对 2024 年前景的预期过高，导致一些个股大幅亏损——但总体来看，实际上相当令人印象深刻。

Annual earnings growth for S&P500 companies is now expected to have picked up to a 4.3% annual growth rate, according to LSEG estimates, from as low as 1.6% before the reporting season began. And 77% of companies have beaten Wall Street forecasts.翻译:据 LSEG 估计，标准普尔 500 指数公司的年盈利增长率目前预计将从报告季开始前的 1.6% 回升至 4.3%。 77% 的公司超出了华尔街的预测。

A big problem for small firms, however, is that they disproportionately bear the burden of the higher borrowing costs that show little sign of coming down any time soon.翻译:然而，小企业面临的一个大问题是，它们不成比例地承受着较高的借贷成本的负担，而这种负担在短期内几乎没有下降的迹象。

The Federal Reserve delivers its latest policy decision on Wednesday and is widely expected to keep rates unchanged for the second straight meeting. Although futures see less than a 50% chance of another rate rise in the cycle, they don't seen a cut coming until June at the earliest.翻译:美联储周三公布最新政策决定，市场普遍预计将连续第二次会议维持利率不变。尽管期货认为周期中再次加息的可能性不到 50%，但最早要到 6 月才会降息。

And even though third-quarter U.S. economic growth raced ahead an annualised 4.9%, many now see that too as a high watermark - with GDP models seeing fourth-quarter growth at less than half that rate for now.翻译:尽管美国第三季度经济增长按年率计算增长 4.9%，但许多人现在仍认为这也是一个高水位——GDP模型显示第四季度的增长目前还不到该增速的一半。

A key input to that as always will be the state of the labor market, with data this Friday expected to show October payroll growth cooling to 188,000 new jobs from the blowout 336,000 gain last month. And autoworker strikes against Detroit's Big Three car manufacturers could subtract at least 29,000 jobs from October, government data shows.翻译:一如既往，劳动力市场的状况将是其中的一个关键因素，本周五的数据预计将显示 10 月份新增就业岗位增幅从上个月的 336,000 个井喷式增长放缓至 188,000 个。政府数据显示，针对底特律三大汽车制造商的汽车工人罢工可能导致 10 月份至少减少 29,000 个工作岗位。

But beyond Fed policy rates, it's the restive bond market and near 16-year-high long-term borrowing costs that are starting to hurt most. As much concern as there is with the slew of new government debt coming down the pike, a key moment this week may well be the Treasury's quarterly refunding plans today and Wednesday.翻译:但除了美联储的政策利率之外，动荡的债券市场和接近 16 年高位的长期借贷成本也开始受到最严重的影响。尽管人们对大量新政府债务不断涌现感到担忧，但本周的一个关键时刻很可能是财政部今天和周三的季度退款计划。

For now at least, market concern about the tense Middle East conflict has allowed some relief. Even though Israel's land invasion of Gaza appears to be under way amid heavy fighting and a dire humanitarian crisis, demands for some aid-related ceasefire are growing.翻译:至少目前，市场对中东紧张冲突的担忧有所缓解。尽管以色列对加沙的陆地入侵似乎是在激烈的战斗和严峻的人道主义危机中进行的，但对与援助有关的停火的要求却在不断增加。

Global bourses and Wall St futures were higher to start the week, with oil and gold prices ebbing a bit - the former now back down 4% year-on-year.翻译:全球股市和华尔街期货本周开盘走高，其中石油和黄金价格小幅下跌——前者现已同比下跌 4%。

Apple (AAPL.O) dominates the week's earnings diary on Thursday. HSBC HSBA.L gained 1.2% in London after reporting a fresh $3 billion share buyback and a more than doubling of third-quarter profit.翻译:苹果公司（AAPL.O）在周四的本周财报中占据主导地位。 汇丰银行 (HSBC) HSBA.L 在伦敦上涨1.2%，此前该股公布了新一轮 30 亿美元的股票回购，第三季度利润增长了一倍多。

U.S. 10-year Treasury yields held steady at 4.85% - well below the 5% threshold they breached last week.翻译:美国10年期国债收益率稳定在4.85%——远低于上周突破的5%门槛。

The dollar (.DXY) was a touch higher, with the Swiss franc ebbing as the Swiss National Bank cut the rate on overnight deposits it pays on commercial bank reserves.翻译:美元（.DXY）小幅走高，瑞士法郎因瑞士国家银行降低商业银行准备金隔夜存款利率而下跌。

The yen was firmer as Japanese government bond yields climbed to fresh 10-year peaks near 0.9% on Monday, with markets weighing the chances of another policy tweak in Tuesday's latest monetary policy decision from the Bank of Japan.翻译:由于日本政府债券收益率周一攀升至接近 0.9% 的新的 10 年高点，日元走强，市场权衡日本央行周二最新货币政策决定再次调整政策的可能性。

In Europe, data showed Germany's economy contracted by a smaller-than-forecast 0.1% in the third quarter but October inflation numbers showed a sharp easing of price pressures.翻译:在欧洲，数据显示德国经济第三季度萎缩0.1%，低于预期，但10月份通胀数据显示物价压力大幅缓解。

In Hong Kong, a court gave China Evergrande (3333.HK) a five-week reprieve to come up with a deal with creditors or face liquidation after the embattled developer said on Monday it was working on a revised debt-restructuring plan.翻译:在香港，陷入困境的开发商中国恒大（3333.HK）周一表示正在制定修订后的债务重组计划，法院给予其五周缓刑，以便与债权人达成协议，否则将面临清算。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Monday:翻译:周一晚些时候应为美国市场提供更多方向的关键事态发展：

* Dallas Fed manufacturing survey翻译:* 达拉斯联储制造业调查

* U.S. corporate earnings: McDonald's, Loews, Western Digital, FMC, Arista Networks, Welltower, VF, Revvity, Simon Property, Healthpeak, Arch Capital, ON Semiconductor翻译:* 美国企业盈利：麦当劳、Loews、西部数据、FMC、Arista Networks、Welltower、VF、Revvity、Simon Property、Healthpeak、Arch Capital、安森美半导体

* U.S. Treasury auctions 3-, 6-month bills翻译:* 美国财政部拍卖3个月、6个月期国债

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪第三季度利润创历史新高，达 14.2 亿美元
item.description:
China's BYD Co Ltd (002594.SZ), on Monday posted record third-quarter earnings, its highest ever for any quarter, as the electric vehicle giant preserved its domestic market leadership despite softer demand and increased competition.翻译:中国比亚迪股份有限公司（002594.SZ）周一公布了创纪录的第三季度盈利，为历史最高水平，尽管需求疲软和竞争加剧，这家电动汽车巨头仍保持了其国内市场的领先地位。

Net profit for the third quarter reached 10.41 billion yuan ($1.42 billion), a 82.2% increase from a year earlier, on a 38.5% rise in revenue to 162.2 billion yuan, BYD said in a market filing. It flagged earlier this month that third-quarter net profit could as much as double.翻译:比亚迪在一份市场文件中表示，第三季度净利润达到人民币104.1亿元（合14.2亿美元），同比增长82.2%，收入增长38.5%，达到人民币1622亿元。该公司本月早些时候表示，第三季度净利润可能翻倍。

That was a smaller increase than the second quarter when profit was up 145%. The third-quarter earnings was within its forecast range of between 9.55 billion yuan and 11.55 billion yuan.翻译:这比第二季度利润增长 145% 的增幅要小。第三季度盈利在95.5亿元至115.5亿元的预测范围内。

($1 = 7.3156 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.3156 人民币）

item.title: 独家：美军大量购买日本海鲜以对抗中国禁令
item.description:
The United States has started bulk buying Japanese seafood to supply its military there in response to China's ban on such products imposed after Tokyo released treated water from its crippled Fukushima nuclear plant into the sea.翻译:美国已开始大量购买日本海鲜，供应其军队，以回应中国在东京将受损的福岛核电站处理过的水排入大海后对此类产品实施的禁令。

Unveiling the initiative in a Reuters interview on Monday, U.S. ambassador to Japan Rahm Emanuel said Washington should also look more broadly into how it could help offset China's ban that he said was part of its "economic wars".翻译:美国驻日本大使拉姆·伊曼纽尔周一在接受路透社采访时宣布了这一举措，他表示华盛顿还应该更广泛地研究如何帮助抵消中国的禁令，他称这是其“经济战”的一部分。

China, which had been the biggest buyer of Japanese seafood, says its ban is due to food safety fears.翻译:中国曾是日本海鲜的最大买家，表示其禁令是出于对食品安全的担忧。

The U.N.'s nuclear watchdog vouched for the safety of the water release that began in August from the plant wrecked by a 2011 tsunami. G7 trade ministers on Sunday called for the immediate repeal of bans on Japanese food.翻译:联合国核监督机构保证了 2011 年海啸毁坏核电站从 8 月份开始放水的安全性。七国集团贸易部长周日呼吁立即废除对日本食品的禁令。

"It's going to be a long-term contract between the U.S. armed forces and the fisheries and co-ops here in Japan," Emanuel said.翻译:伊曼纽尔说：“这将是美国武装部队与日本渔业和合作社之间的长期合同。”

"The best way we have proven in all the instances to kind of wear out China's economic coercion is come to the aid and assistance of the targeted country or industry," he said.翻译:他说：“我们在所有情况下都证明，消除中国经济胁迫的最佳方式是向目标国家或行业提供援助和协助。”

Asked about Emanuel's comments at a press conference on Monday, China's foreign ministry spokesperson Wang Wenbin said: "the responsibility of diplomats is to promote friendship between countries rather than smearing other countries and stirring up trouble".翻译:在周一的记者会上被问及伊曼纽尔的言论时，中国外交部发言人汪文斌表示：“外交官的责任是促进国家间友谊，而不是抹黑别国、挑起事端”。

The first purchase of seafood by the U.S. under the scheme involves just shy of a metric ton of scallops, a tiny fraction of more than 100,000 tons of scallops that Japan exported to mainland China last year.翻译:美国根据该计划首次购买的海鲜涉及不到一吨的扇贝，这与日本去年向中国大陆出口的超过10万吨扇贝相比只是微不足道的。

Emanuel said the purchases - which will feed soldiers in messes and aboard vessels as well as being sold in shops and restaurants on military bases - will increase over time to all types of seafood. The U.S. military had not previously bought local seafood in Japan, he said.翻译:伊曼纽尔表示，随着时间的推移，所有类型的海鲜的采购量将增加，这些采购量将为食堂和船上的士兵提供食物，并在军事基地的商店和餐馆出售。他说，美军此前没有购买过日本当地的海鲜。

The U.S. could also look at its overall fish imports from Japan and China, he said. The U.S. is also in talks with Japanese authorities to help direct locally-caught scallops to U.S.-registered processors.翻译:他说，美国还可以考虑从日本和中国进口的鱼类总量。美国还在与日本当局进行谈判，以帮助将当地捕获的扇贝运送到在美国注册的加工商。

'NOT A CHINA HAWK'

Emanuel, who was former U.S. President Barack Obama's White House chief of staff, has in recent months made a series of blunt statements on China, taking aim at various issues including its economic policies, opaque decision-making and treatment of foreign firms.翻译:曾任美国前总统奥巴马的白宫办公厅主任伊曼纽尔近几个月针对中国发表了一系列直言不讳的言论，矛头直指中国的经济政策、决策不透明、外国企业待遇等问题。

That has come as top U.S. officials, including Secretary of State Antony Blinken, have visited Beijing in an effort to draw a line under strained ties.翻译:在此之前，包括国务卿安东尼·布林肯在内的美国高级官员已访问北京，试图与紧张的关系划清界限。

Asked if he considered himself hawkish on China, Emanuel rejected the term and said he was a "realist".翻译:当被问及他是否认为自己对中国持强硬态度时，伊曼纽尔拒绝了这个说法，并表示他是一个“现实主义者”。

"I don't consider it hawkish but just consider it realist and honest. Maybe the honesty is painful, but it's honest," he said.翻译:“我不认为这是鹰派，而是认为它是现实和诚实的。也许诚实是痛苦的，但它是诚实的，”他说。

"I'm all for stability, understanding. That doesn't mean you're not honest. They're not contradictory. One of the ways you establish stability, is that you're able to be honest with each other."翻译:“我完全支持稳定和理解。这并不意味着你不诚实。它们并不矛盾。建立稳定的方法之一就是你们能够彼此诚实。”

He said China faced major economic challenges exacerbated by a leadership intent on turning their backs on international systems.翻译:他表示，中国面临重大经济挑战，而领导层有意背弃国际体系，加剧了这一挑战。

"The kind of loser in this is the youth of China. You now have a situation where 30% of the Chinese youth, one out of three, are unemployed. You have major cities with unfinished housing ... you have major municipalities not able to pay city workers. Why? Because China made a political decision to turn their back on a system in which they were benefiting."翻译:“这方面的输家是中国的年轻人。现在的情况是，30%的中国年轻人，即三分之一，失业。主要城市的住房未完工……主要城市无法完成住房建设。”向城市工人支付工资。为什么？因为中国做出了一项政治决定，放弃了他们从中受益的制度。”

The most recent official youth unemployment data from China, published in July before Beijing said it was suspending publication of the numbers, showed it jumping to a record high of 21.3%.翻译:中国最新的官方青年失业率数据显示，该数据跃升至 21.3% 的历史新高。

Emanuel said he was also keeping an eye on how China's leadership responds to the recent death of former Premier Li Keqiang, a reformist who was sidelined by President Xi Jinping.翻译:伊曼纽尔表示，他也在关注中国领导层对前总理李克强最近去世的反应。李克强是一名被国家主席习近平排挤的改革派人士。

"What's ... interesting to me, that I think is telltale, is how they will be treating his funeral and how they'll be treating comments about him," he said.翻译:“对我来说……有趣的是，我认为这很能说明问题，他们将如何对待他的葬礼，以及他们将如何对待有关他的评论，”他说。

"I do think that there's kind of a section of China that sees what kind of policies he was pursuing as kind of the best of China. But that's up for China to decide."翻译:“我确实认为，中国有一部分人认为他所奉行的政策是中国最好的政策。但这要由中国决定。”

item.title: 香港法院因煽动暴力对待警察而入狱前学生领袖
item.description:
A Hong Kong court on Monday sentenced four former members of the student union of the University of Hong Kong to 2 years in jail for inciting others to wound police officers after they issued a statement supporting a man who stabbed a policeman.翻译:香港一家法院周一判处四名前香港大学学生会成员两年监禁，罪名是他们发表声明支持一名刺伤警察的男子，罪名是煽动他人伤害警察。

District Court Judge Adriana Noelle Tse Ching said the students had committed a very serious offense by inciting hatred against the police. "A lenient sentencing would pass a wrong message to the society," she added.翻译:区域法院法官阿德里亚娜·诺埃尔·谢青表示，这些学生煽动对警察的仇恨，犯下了非常严重的罪行。 “宽大的量刑会向社会传递错误的信息，”她补充道。

The students included Charles Kwok, 22, a former student union president. Kwok and the other student union council members had issued a statement, which they later withdrew, in which they mourned 50-year-old Leung Kin-fai, who stabbed a policeman and then killed himself on July 1, 2021.翻译:这些学生包括 22 岁的前学生会主席 Charles Kwok。郭和其他学生会成员曾发表声明，悼念于2021年7月1日刺伤一名警察然后自杀的50岁梁建辉，但随后又撤回。

The students were initially arrested and charged with advocating terrorism under Hong Kong's national security law in August 2021. They earlier pleaded not guilty to the terrorism charge but admitted to the charge of incitement to wound with intent. The judge then dropped the terrorism charge.翻译:这些学生最初于 2021 年 8 月根据香港国家安全法被捕，并被指控宣扬恐怖主义。他们早些时候对恐怖主义指控表示不认罪，但承认故意煽动伤人的指控。法官随后撤销了恐怖主义指控。

Beijing imposed the national security law on Hong Kong in 2020 after months of anti-government protests. The law punishes acts including subversion, collusion with foreign forces and terrorism with up to life in prison.翻译:经过数月的反政府抗议后，北京于 2020 年对香港实施国家安全法。该法对颠覆、勾结外国势力和恐怖主义等行为的处罚最高可达终身监禁。

The maximum penalty for both advocating terrorism and inciting others to wound with intent is life imprisonment. The maximum sentence a district court judge can impose is 7 years.翻译:宣扬恐怖主义和煽动他人故意伤害的最高刑罚是无期徒刑。地区法院法官可判处的最高刑期为 7 年。

The national security law has been criticised as a tool of repression by governments including the United States. The Chinese and Hong Kong governments, however, say it has restored stability in the city after protracted pro-democracy protests in 2019.翻译:国家安全法被包括美国在内的各国政府批评为镇压工具。然而，中国和香港政府表示，在 2019 年旷日持久的民主抗议活动之后，香港已经恢复了稳定。

Reporting by Jessie Pang; Editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:彭洁西报道；米拉尔·法赫米编辑

item.title: 俄罗斯将简化“友好”国家的外来投资——总理
item.description:
Prime Minister Mikhail Mishustin said on Monday that Russia would create a simplified procedure for citizens and companies from "friendly" countries to invest there.翻译:俄罗斯总理米哈伊尔·米舒斯京周一表示，俄罗斯将为“友好”国家的公民和公司在当地投资制定简化程序。

Mishustin said entities from a list of 25 countries would be allowed to open bank accounts in Russia and make deposits via a simplified procedure.翻译:米舒斯京表示，来自 25 个国家的实体将被允许在俄罗斯开设银行账户，并通过简化程序进行存款。

"Creating more convenient conditions for foreign enterprises and entrepreneurs is an important part of the government’s systemic efforts to achieve financial sovereignty as part of the implementation of the national goals set by our president," Mishustin said in a statement.翻译:米舒斯京在一份声明中表示：“为外国企业和企业家创造更便利的条件是政府实现金融主权的系统性努力的重要组成部分，也是落实我们总统设定的国家目标的一部分。”

It said the procedure would apply to 25 "friendly" countries including China, India, Brazil, Saudi Arabia, Turkey, Kazakhstan and Belarus.翻译:声明称，该程序将适用于25个“友好”国家，包括中国、印度、巴西、沙特阿拉伯、土耳其、哈萨克斯坦和白俄罗斯。

Moscow defines "unfriendly" countries as those that have joined a barrage of Western-led economic sanctions in response to Russia's war in Ukraine.翻译:莫斯科将“不友好”国家定义为那些加入西方主导的一系列经济制裁以应对俄罗斯乌克兰战争的国家。

item.title: 中国外交部：中美应“客观”认识战略意图
item.description:
China and the United States should have an objective understanding of each other's strategic intention and take the correct view of competitive factors in future exchanges, China's foreign ministry said on Monday.翻译:中国外交部周一表示，中美双方应客观认识彼此战略意图，正确看待未来交往中的竞争因素。

Wang Wenbin, a ministry spokesperson, was speaking at a regular press briefing when asked about China's top diplomat Wang Yi saying the road to a meeting between the countries' leaders in San Francisco would not be smooth.翻译:外交部发言人汪文斌在例行新闻发布会上被问及中国最高外交官王毅时表示，两国领导人在旧金山会晤的道路不会一帆风顺。

China's foreign minister met U.S. President Joe Biden and his top aides in Washington in recent days, agreeing to work together toward the expected bilateral meeting on the sidelines of an Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation forum summit.翻译:中国外长近日在华盛顿会见了美国总统乔·拜登及其高级助手，同意共同努力，推动亚太经济合作论坛峰会期间举行的双边会晤。

"Wang Yi pointed out that looking back on the tortuous course of Sino-U.S. relations since beginning of this year, the experience is worth summarising and the lessons need to be learned," ministry spokesperson Wang said.翻译:王毅指出，回顾今年以来中美关系的曲折历程，经验值得总结，教训需要吸取。

In highlighting the talks, the ministry spokesperson said China's top diplomat stressed that the most important thing is to abide by the consensus of the two heads of state, to stabilise bilateral relations between China and the United States, and to maintain open channels of communication.翻译:外交部发言人在介绍此次会谈时表示，中国最高外交官强调，最重要的是遵守两国元首共识，稳定中美双边关系，保持开放的沟通渠道。

China and the United States have also agreed to hold consultations on maritime affairs as well as arms control and non-proliferation in the coming days, the spokesperson said.翻译:发言人表示，中美双方还同意近期就海洋事务、军控与防扩散问题举行磋商。

Reporting by Liz Lee; Writing by Bernard Orr; Editing by Christopher Cushing翻译:丽兹·李报道；伯纳德·奥尔撰写；克里斯托弗·库欣编辑

item.title: 买家重返中国最大的贸易展览会，但订单仍然难以捉摸
item.description:
Foreign buyers returned in force for the autumn round of the world's largest trade show, heading towards pre-COVID numbers, but Chinese sellers said orders remain low as Christmas nears, with few expecting global demand to recover soon.翻译:外国买家大批回归参加秋季全球最大贸易展，数量接近新冠疫情之前的水平，但中国卖家表示，随着圣诞节临近，订单仍然很低，很少有人预计全球需求会很快复苏。

With three days left of the Canton Fair's final phase, some 157,200 overseas buyers had visited by Saturday, organisers said, to throng booths sprawling over 1.5 million sq m (1.8 million sq yards), or the equivalent of 280 football fields.翻译:组织者称，广交会最后阶段还剩三天，截至周六已有约 157,200 名海外买家参观，展位面积超过 150 万平方米（180 万平方英尺），相当于 280 个足球场。

The visitor numbers were up 53.6% on the spring event, which was the first after the COVID-19 pandemic, and drive attendance figures into the same ballpark as the 186,000 foreigners who visited in the autumn of 2019.翻译:春季活动的游客人数增长了 53.6%，这是 COVID-19 大流行后的首次活动，参观人数与 2019 年秋季参观的 186,000 名外国人持平。

"You would never know COVID had happened," said David Holmes, a British buyer for the hospitality industry in Britain and North America, who has been visiting for more than 15 years.翻译:“你永远不会知道新冠病毒已经发生了，”英国和北美酒店业的英国买家戴维·霍姆斯 (David Holmes) 说，他来英国已经超过 15 年了。

Holmes was scouring the glass and ceramic products among tens of thousands of booths selling everything from tents and kitchen worktops to goblin costumes.翻译:霍姆斯正在数以万计的摊位中搜寻玻璃和陶瓷产品，这些摊位出售从帐篷、厨房台面到妖精服装等各种商品。

But 2023 had been a tough year, Holmes reckoned.翻译:但霍姆斯认为 2023 年是艰难的一年。

"With inflation coming down, one would hope that things will get a bit easier, the current situation will improve, and at that point the consumer will get more confidence.翻译:“随着通胀下降，人们会希望事情会变得容易一些，目前的情况会有所改善，届时消费者会更有信心。

"At the moment they're wanting to save the money they've got for heating homes and feeding families."翻译:“目前，他们想存下钱来为家庭取暖和养家糊口。”

Ten exporters who normally do much of their business in Europe said sales there were down 10% to 30% this year.翻译:通常在欧洲开展大部分业务的 10 家出口商表示，今年的销售额下降了 10% 至 30%。

"Everyone is affected, because the price of electricity has gone up a lot, and the war with Russia and Ukraine is still going on, and now with Israel, a lot of people are really scared," said Jimmy Chen, the boss of Chengkuo Group.翻译:“每个人都受到影响，因为电价涨了很多，而且与俄罗斯和乌克兰的战争还在继续，现在又与以色列，很多人真的很害怕，”成国老板吉米·陈(Jimmy Chen)说。团体。

Sales were down about a tenth, said Chen, speaking in front of his company's display of life-sized Father Christmas dolls and elves lined up on shelves.翻译:陈在他的公司陈列着真人大小的圣诞老人娃娃和货架上的小精灵前说道，销售额下降了大约十分之一。

"We do a lot (of business) with German markets and if they're not strong, then Western Europe's feeling unstable."翻译:“我们与德国市场有很多（业务），如果它们不强劲，那么西欧就会感觉不稳定。”

The most recent trade data showed China's slump in exports and imports was gradually easing, as exports in September declined 6.2% from a year ago, a moderation from August's drop of 8.8%.翻译:最新贸易数据显示，中国进出口下滑态势正在逐步缓解，9月份出口同比下降6.2%，较8月份8.8%的降幅有所放缓。

The trend appeared to be backed up by improvement last month in new export orders featuring in an official factory survey two weeks ago, partly because of a peak export shipping season for Christmas products and favourable base effects.翻译:两周前的官方工厂调查显示，上个月新出口订单的改善似乎支持了这一趋势，部分原因是圣诞产品的出口运输旺季和有利的基数效应。

While orders were finished for this coming Christmas, Chen was still hopeful for an improvement by the second half of 2024.翻译:虽然即将到来的圣诞节订单已经完成，但陈仍对 2024 年下半年的情况有所改善抱有希望。

Xiao Haicheng, of Foshan Gaoming Yuehua Sanitary Ware, said the maker of jacuzzis and luxury showers plans to push sales to countries participating in the Belt and Road initiative, to help offset this year's revenue drop of 30% in sales to Europe, its main market.翻译:佛山高明粤华卫浴的肖海成表示，这家按摩浴缸和豪华淋浴制造商计划将销售推向“一带一路”沿线国家，以帮助抵消今年其主要市场欧洲销售收入下降30%的影响。 。

"We've got to supplement it somewhere, though we're definitely more optimistic than during the pandemic," he said.翻译:他说：“我们必须在某个地方进行补充，尽管我们肯定比大流行期间更加乐观。”

The European Union's trade deficit with China widened to $276.6 billion in 2022 from $208.4 billion a year earlier, Chinese customs data shows.翻译:中国海关数据显示，2022年欧盟对华贸易逆差从上年的2084亿美元扩大至2766亿美元。

China's exports to the European Union fell 10.6% on the year in the first nine months of 2023, to stand at $382.18 billion, while exports to the United States fell 16.4% to $372.25 billion, official data shows.翻译:官方数据显示，2023年前9个月，中国对欧盟的出口同比下降10.6%，至3821.8亿美元，而对美国的出口下降16.4%，至3722.5亿美元。

Reporting by David Kirton; Additional reporting by Joe Cash in Beijing; Editing by Clarence Fernandez翻译:大卫·科顿报道； Joe Cash 在北京的补充报道；克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑

item.title: 中国恒大清盘听证会因寻求新债务协议而延期
item.description:
Summary:
  • Evergrande winding-up hearing adjourned until Dec 4翻译:恒大清盘听证会延期至12月4日
  • Judge says delay will be the last before decision is made翻译:法官表示延迟将是做出决定前的最后一次
  • Evergrande plans to monetise two listed units in revised plan翻译:恒大计划在修订计划中将两个上市单位货币化
  • Evergrande reaches out with new plan in past weeks - bondholders翻译:恒大在过去几周公布了新计划-债券持有人
  • Logan Group winding-up hearing also adjourned to Dec 4翻译:Logan Group 清盘听证会也延期至 12 月 4 日

A Hong Kong court gave China Evergrande Group (3333.HK) a five week reprieve to come up deal with creditors or face liquidation after the embattled developer said on Monday it was working on a revised debt restructuring plan.翻译:陷入困境的中国恒大集团（3333.HK）周一表示正在制定修订后的债务重组计划，香港一家法院给予该公司五周的缓刑，以与债权人达成协议，否则将面临清算。

The Hong Kong High Court agreed to further adjourn a hearing to wind up Evergrande to Dec. 4, with Justice Linda Chan saying the next hearing would be the last before a decision is made on liquidating the company.翻译:香港高等法院同意将恒大清盘听证会进一步推迟至12月4日，法官陈嘉欣表示，下一次听证会将是做出清算公司决定之前的最后一次听证会。

Evergrande needed to come up with a "concrete" revised restructuring proposal before that date, she said, otherwise it was likely the firm would be wound up.翻译:她表示，恒大需要在此日期之前提出“具体”的修订后的重组方案，否则该公司可能会被清盘。

Evergrande, which has more than $300 billion of liabilities, defaulted on its offshore debt in late 2021 and became the poster child of a debt crisis that has since engulfed China's property sector.翻译:负债超过3000亿美元的恒大集团于2021年底出现境外债务违约，成为席卷中国房地产业的债务危机的典型代表。

Evergrande had been working on a $23 billion offshore debt restructuring plan which was thrown off course last month when its billionaire founder Hui Ka Yan was confirmed to be under investigation for suspected criminal activities.翻译:恒大一直在制定一项230亿美元的离岸债务重组计划，上个月该计划因亿万富翁创始人许家印被证实因涉嫌犯罪活动而接受调查而被打乱。

Due to an investigation into its flagship property unit, Evergrande was barred by mainland regulators from issuing new dollar bonds, a crucial part of the restructuring plan.翻译:由于对其旗舰房地产部门进行调查，恒大被内地监管机构禁止发行新的美元债券，这是重组计划的重要组成部分。

Evergrande's lawyer told the court on Monday the company plans to "monetise the value" of its two Hong Kong-listed units.翻译:恒大的律师周一告诉法庭，该公司计划将其两家在香港上市的子公司“价值货币化”。

Evergrande has reached out to some bondholders with a new restructuring plan in the past two weeks, two sources said.翻译:两名消息人士称，过去两周，恒大已向一些债券持有人提出了新的重组计划。

The revised plan would allow bondholders to swap their bonds into equity and bonds tied to two listed subsidiaries, Evergrande Property Services Group (6666.HK) and Evergrande New Energy Vehicle Group (0708.HK). Any proposal no longer includes new notes to be issued by China Evergrande, they added.翻译:修订后的计划将允许债券持有人将其债券转换为与恒大物业服务集团（6666.HK）和恒大新能源汽车集团（0708.HK）这两家上市子公司挂钩的股权和债券。他们补充说，任何提案都不再包括中国恒大将发行的新票据。

Evergrande did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:恒大没有回应置评请求。

'NO BETTER OPTION'

The company's shares closed down 9.8% on Monday, having fallen as much as 23% in the morning session before the adjournment.翻译:该公司股价周一收盘下跌 9.8%，休会前早盘跌幅高达 23%。

China's property sector accounts for about a quarter of the activity in the world's second-largest economy. Its woes have rattled global markets and prompted a slew of measures by Beijing to reassure investors and homeowners.翻译:中国的房地产业约占世界第二大经济体经济活动的四分之一。它的困境震惊了全球市场，并促使北京采取一系列措施安抚投资者和房主。

A liquidation of Evergrande, which listed total assets of $240 billion as at end-June, would send further shockwaves through already fragile capital markets, but is expected to have little immediate impact on the company's operations, including its many home construction projects.翻译:恒大截至6月底的总资产为2400亿美元，其清算将给本已脆弱的资本市场带来进一步冲击，但预计不会对该公司的运营（包括其许多住宅建设项目）产生直接影响。

"The company has been given a very clear message by the court that this is the last chance to propose a viable restructuring plan that is acceptable to the creditors," Neil McDonald, a Kirkland Ellis partner who represents the major bondholder group, told Reuters.翻译:代表主要债券持有人团体的柯克兰埃利斯合伙人尼尔·麦克唐纳对路透社表示：“法院向该公司发出了非常明确的信息，这是提出债权人可以接受的可行重组计划的最后机会。”

A lawyer for the bondholders group told the court they supported the adjournment, because a restructuring plan could have a higher recovery rate for creditors than a liquidation scenario of less than 3%.翻译:债券持有人团体的一名律师告诉法庭，他们支持延期，因为重组计划可能比清算方案为债权人带来更高的回收率（低于 3%）。

Top Shine, an investor in Evergrande unit Fangchebao, filed the winding-up petition in June 2022 because it said Evergrande had not honoured an agreement to repurchase shares the investor bought in the unit.翻译:恒大旗下房车宝的投资者Top Shine于2022年6月提交了清盘申请，因为该公司表示恒大没有履行回购该投资者在该子公司购买的股份的协议。

LOGAN LIQUIDATION

Fellow property developer Logan Group's (3380.HK) winding up order was also adjourned by the same court to Dec 4.翻译:同为房地产开发商的龙光集团（3380.HK）的清盘令也被同一法院推迟至12月4日。

The Shenzhen-based company said last year it would suspend interest payments and restructure its offshore debt including $3.7 billion in dollar bonds due to liquidity pressure.翻译:这家总部位于深圳的公司去年表示，由于流动性压力，将暂停支付利息并重组其离岸债务，其中包括 37 亿美元的美元债券。

Little progress has been made on the restructuring talks since the company said in March it started negotiations with offshore creditors to agree with proposed restructuring terms, bondholders told Reuters.翻译:债券持有人告诉路透社，自该公司三月份表示开始与境外债权人谈判以就拟议的重组条款达成一致以来，重组谈判几乎没有取得任何进展。

Logan did not respond to request for comment.翻译:洛根没有回应置评请求。

Logan and two of its subsidiaries received a winding-up petition in Nov 2022 filed by the bond trustee who represents a few investors holding the 5.75% 2025 bond.翻译:Logan 及其两家子公司于 2022 年 11 月收到了债券受托人提交的清盘申请，该受托人代表持有 5.75% 2025 年债券的少数投资者。

Reporting by Clare Jim and Xie Yu in Hong Kong; Additional reporting by Scott Murdoch in Sydney; Editing by Lincoln Feast and Miral Fahmy翻译:Clare Jim 和 Xie Yu 在香港的报道；斯科特·默多克在悉尼的补充报道；林肯·费斯特和米拉尔·法赫米编辑
item.author: Clare Jim, Yu Xie

item.title: 中国将派科技部副部长出席英国全球人工智能峰会--消息人士
item.description:
China will send Wu Zhaohui, a Vice Minister of Science and Technology, to a global summit on artificial intelligence this week in Britain, two sources familiar with the matter said.翻译:两位知情人士称，中国将派科技部副部长吴朝晖参加本周在英国举行的全球人工智能峰会。

Britain is bringing together representatives of AI companies, political leaders and experts on Nov. 1-2 to discuss what some see as the risks posed by the technology, with an aim of building an international consensus on its safe development.翻译:英国将于 11 月 1 日至 2 日召集人工智能公司代表、政治领导人和专家讨论一些人认为该技术带来的风险，旨在就其安全发展达成国际共识。

China last week accepted Britain's invitation to attend the summit, in another sign of thawing relations, after Britain's top diplomat James Cleverly visited Beijing in August in the first trip by a British foreign secretary in five years.翻译:继英国最高外交官詹姆斯·克莱弗利 (James Cleverly) 于八月访问北京，这是英国外交大臣五年来首次访问北京后，中国上周接受了英国出席峰会的邀请，这是两国关系解冻的又一迹象。

Britain is trying to improve ties with China after the relationship sunk to its lowest point in decades under former Prime Minister Boris Johnson, when London restricted some Chinese investment over national security worries and expressed concern over a crackdown on freedoms in Hong Kong.翻译:英国正试图改善与中国的关系，此前英国在前首相鲍里斯·约翰逊(Boris Johnson)的领导下，两国关系跌至数十年来的最低点，当时伦敦出于国家安全担忧限制了一些中国投资，并对香港自由受到打压表示担忧。

Visits to China by senior British civil servants and former officials have increased in recent months. Former Prime Minister Tony Blair visited Beijing earlier this month and met Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi, as Beijing seeks to boost ties with the Labour party ahead of a general election likely next year.翻译:近几个月来，英国高级公务员和前官员访华次数有所增加。前首相托尼·布莱尔本月早些时候访问了北京，并会见了中国外交部长王毅，北京方面寻求在明年可能举行的大选之前加强与工党的关系。

Wu will be joined by representatives from the Chinese foreign ministry, companies and academic bodies including the Chinese Academy of Sciences, Alibaba (9988.HK) and Tencent (0700.HK), according to one of the sources, who declined to be identified as the information remained confidential.翻译:据一位不愿透露姓名的消息人士称，吴先生将与中国外交部、中国科学院、阿里巴巴（9988.HK）和腾讯（0700.HK）等公司和学术机构的代表一起出席。该信息仍然保密。

Alibaba, Tencent and Britain's Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office did not respond immediately to requests for comment. China's science ministry and foreign ministry, as well as the Chinese Academy of Sciences, did not respond immediately to faxed requests for comment.翻译:阿里巴巴、腾讯和英国外交、联邦和发展办公室没有立即回应置评请求。中国科学部、外交部以及中国科学院没有立即回复传真置评请求。

Wu was appointed to his role in the science ministry in December 2022. China is restructuring the ministry to channel more resources into achieving scientific breakthroughs, with a goal of moving faster towards self-reliance.翻译:吴于 2022 年 12 月被任命担任科学部职务。中国正在重组该部，以投入更多资源来实现科学突破，目标是更快地实现自力更生。

The other source said that President Xi Jinping had initially been invited, adding that there had been a big discussion over whether Britain should invite any Chinese officials. "But eventually the view was taken that to not invite China would be counter-productive," the source said. They also declined to be named as the information was confidential.翻译:另一位消息人士称，习近平主席最初受到了邀请，并补充说，英国是否应该邀请任何中国官员进行了激烈的讨论。 “但最终人们认为不邀请中国会适得其反，”消息人士称。由于信息保密，他们也拒绝透露姓名。

Like many countries around the world, China has been caught up in a global craze over generative AI following the popularity of OpenAI's ChatGPT last year.翻译:与世界上许多国家一样，继去年 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 流行之后，中国也卷入了全球生成式人工智能的热潮。

China now has at least 130 large language models launched by companies including Alibaba and Tencent, accounting for 40% of the global total and just behind the United States' 50% share, according to brokerage CLSA.翻译:据券商里昂证券(CLSA)称，中国目前至少有130个由阿里巴巴、腾讯等公司推出的大型语言模型，占全球总数的40%，仅落后于美国50%的份额。

Reporting by Laurie Chen in Beijing and Brenda Goh in Shanghai; editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:Laurie Chen 在北京和 Brenda Goh 在上海的报道；米拉尔·法赫米 编辑
item.author: Laurie Chen, Brenda Goh

item.title: 俄罗斯总统绍伊古指责西方试图将乌克兰战争扩大到亚太地区
item.description:
Russian Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu said the West wants to expand the conflict in the Ukraine to the Asia-Pacific region, Russian state media reported, citing comments made at a Beijing defence forum on Monday.翻译:据俄罗斯官方媒体报道，俄罗斯国防部长绍伊古周一在北京防务论坛上发表评论称，西方希望将乌克兰冲突扩大到亚太地区。

Speaking at the Xiangshan Forum, China's biggest military diplomacy event, Shoigu said NATO is covering up a build-up of forces in the Asia-Pacific region with an "ostentatious desire for dialogue", Russia's TASS news agency reported.翻译:据俄罗斯塔斯社报道，绍伊古在中国最大的军事外交活动香山论坛上发表讲话时表示，北约正在以“夸张的对话愿望”来掩盖在亚太地区的军力集结。

Shoigu said NATO countries were promoting an arms race in the region, increasing their military presence and the frequency and scale of military drills there.翻译:绍伊古表示，北约国家正在推动该地区的军备竞赛，增加在该地区的军事存在以及军事演习的频率和规模。

U.S. forces will use information exchanges with Tokyo and Seoul on missile launches to deter Russia and China, Shoigu said. He also accused Washington of trying to use climate change and natural disasters as an excuse for "humanitarian interventions".翻译:绍伊古表示，美军将利用与东京和首尔交换导弹发射信息来威慑俄罗斯和中国。他还指责华盛顿试图利用气候变化和自然灾害作为“人道主义干预”的借口。

Shoigu said the emergence of new security blocs such as the Quad and AUKUS undermined the role of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) and nuclear non-proliferation efforts in the region.翻译:绍伊古表示，Quad 和 AUKUS 等新安全集团的出现削弱了东南亚国家联盟（ASEAN）的作用以及该地区的核不扩散努力。

At the same time, he said, Russia's move to revoke its ratification of the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty did not mean the end of the agreement, and Russia was not lowering its threshold for the use of nuclear weapons.翻译:同时，他表示，俄罗斯撤销对《全面禁止核试验条约》的批准并不意味着该协议的结束，俄罗斯也没有降低使用核武器的门槛。

"We are only seeking to restore parity with the United States, who have not ratified this treaty," Russia's RIA news agency quoted Shoigu as saying. "We are not talking about its destruction."翻译:俄罗斯RIA通讯社援引绍伊古的话说：“我们只是寻求恢复与尚未批准该条约的美国的平等。” “我们不是在谈论它的毁灭。”

Shoigu said that Moscow was ready for talks on the post-conflict settlement of the Ukraine crisis on further 'co-existence' with the West, but that Western countries needed to stop seeking Russia's strategic defeat.翻译:绍伊古表示，莫斯科准备就冲突后解决乌克兰危机、与西方进一步“共存”进行谈判，但西方国家需要停止寻求俄罗斯的战略失败。

Making clear the conditions for such talks were not in place yet, Shoigu said: "It is also important to ensure equal relations between all the nuclear powers and permanent United Nations Security Council members who carry special responsibility for upholding peace and global stability."翻译:绍伊古明确表示此类会谈的条件尚未具备：“确保所有核大国与对维护和平与全球稳定负有特殊责任的联合国安理会常任理事国之间的平等关系也很重要。”

Reporting by Lidia Kelly in Sydney; Writing by Liz Lee and Laurie Chen in Beijing and Olzhas Auyezov in Almaty; Editing by Christopher Cushing and Gerry Doyle翻译:莉迪亚·凯利 (Lidia Kelly) 悉尼报道； Liz Lee 和 Laurie Chen 在北京撰写，Olzhas Auyezov 在阿拉木图撰写；克里斯托弗·库欣和格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: COP28 主席和团体敦促到 2030 年将可再生能源发电量增加两倍
item.description:
The presidency of next month's COP28 climate summit and two renewable energy organisations on Monday urged governments to triple renewable energy capacity by 2030 as part of efforts to stop global warming exceeding 1.5 degrees Celsius.翻译:下个月的 COP28 气候峰会主席国和两个可再生能源组织周一敦促各国政府到 2030 年将可再生能源产能增加两倍，作为阻止全球变暖超过 1.5 摄氏度的努力的一部分。

Countries hope to strike a deal on the increase in capacity at the latest round of global climate negotiations set to get under way in Dubai in late November, which will focus on the gaps in the implementation of the 2015 Paris Agreement that established the 1.5°C ceiling.翻译:各国希望在定于 11 月底在迪拜举行的最新一轮全球气候谈判中就增加产能达成协议，该谈判将重点关注 2015 年《巴黎协定》的实施中的差距，该协定确立了 1.5°C 的目标天花板。

Renewable energy capacity needs "to reach more than 11,000 GW" by 2030, the United Arab Emirates' COP28 presidency, the International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA) and the Global Renewables Alliance said in a joint report.翻译:COP28 主席国阿拉伯联合酋长国、国际可再生​​能源机构 (IRENA) 和全球可再生能源联盟在一份联合报告中表示，到 2030 年，可再生能源容量需要“达到 11,000 吉瓦以上”。

Most major economies are already on board with that goal. Group of 20 nations, among them China, the United States and India, agreed in September to pursue efforts to triple global renewable energy capacity by 2030.翻译:大多数主要经济体已经实现了这一目标。包括中国、美国和印度在内的 20 国集团于 9 月同意努力到 2030 年将全球可再生能源产能增加两倍。

Without rapid action to cut CO2 emissions, scientists say Earth will cross the 1.5°C threshold in the coming decade, unleashing far more severe climate change effects on people, wildlife and ecosystems.翻译:科学家表示，如果不迅速采取行动减少二氧化碳排放，地球温度将在未来十年内突破 1.5°C 的门槛，从而对人类、野生动物和生态系统造成更加严重的气候变化影响。

However, striking a deal among the nearly 200 countries that attend COP28 meetings will not be easy. European nations and climate-vulnerable states argue that it is not enough to agree to scale up clean energy, if countries do not also agree to quit the polluting energy that is causing climate change.翻译:然而，参加 COP28 会议的近 200 个国家之间达成协议并不容易。欧洲国家和气候脆弱国家认为，如果各国不同意退出导致气候变化的污染能源，仅仅同意扩大清洁能源规模是不够的。

They say a renewable energy deal at COP28 must be paired with a commitment to phase out CO2-emitting fossil fuels - a pledge that has faced resistance from Saudi Arabia, Russia and other fossil fuel-reliant economies.翻译:他们表示，COP28 上的可再生能源协议必须与逐步淘汰排放二氧化碳的化石燃料的承诺相结合，这一承诺遭到了沙特阿拉伯、俄罗斯和其他依赖化石燃料的经济体的抵制。

"You cannot just have the renewables goal and then call the COP a success," European Union climate policy chief Wopke Hoekstra told an event in Brussels on Friday.翻译:欧盟气候政策负责人沃普克·霍克斯特拉 (Wopke Hoekstra) 周五在布鲁塞尔举行的一次活动中表示：“你不能只实现可再生能源目标，然后就称缔约方会议取得成功。”

Guiding the COP28 talks will be the UAE's Sultan al-Jaber, a choice that has drawn criticism from some U.S. and EU lawmakers as well as campaigners as he is the boss of state oil giant ADNOC, and the UAE's climate envoy.翻译:指导 COP28 谈判的将是阿联酋的苏丹贾比尔，这一选择引起了一些美国和欧盟立法者以及活动人士的批评，因为他是国有石油巨头阿布扎比国家石油公司的老板，也是阿联酋的气候特使。

The report also called for doubling energy efficiency, urging targets with specific time frames, strong regulatory frameworks, financial incentives and awareness campaigns.翻译:该报告还呼吁将能源效率提高一倍，敦促制定具体的时间框架、强有力的监管框架、财政激励措施和宣传活动。

Reporting by Yousef Saba and Kate Abnett, editing by Deborah Kyvrikosaios翻译:由 Yousef Saba 和 Kate Abnett 报道，Deborah Kyvrikosaios 编辑

item.title: 丰田 9 月产量因日本产量强劲而跃升
item.description:
Toyota Motor (7203.T) said on Monday that worldwide production rose 1.5% in September from the same period a year earlier to 900,919 vehicles, boosted by stronger demand in Japan, the United States and in Europe.翻译:丰田汽车(7203.T)周一表示，受日本、美国和欧洲需求强劲的推动，9月份全球产量同比增长1.5%至900,919辆。

The Japanese automaker's domestic production, which accounted for just over a third of the vehicles it produced during the month, rose 12.8% from a year earlier, offsetting a 3.6% decline in overseas output.翻译:这家日本汽车制造商的国内产量占该月汽车产量的三分之一多一点，同比增长 12.8%，抵消了海外产量下降 3.6% 的影响。

The world's biggest automaker by sales reported an 11.6% jump in global sales in September to 921,308 vehicles.翻译:这家全球销量最大的汽车制造商报告称，9 月份全球销量增长 11.6%，达到 921,308 辆。

Its sales and production both hit a record for the month.翻译:当月销量和产量均创历史新高。

Toyota has sold more than 7.5 million vehicles during the first nine months of the year.翻译:今年前 9 个月，丰田汽车销量超过 750 万辆。

The figures include its luxury Lexus brand.翻译:这些数字包括其豪华品牌雷克萨斯。

Domestic sales surged 20.5% in September, while those in the United States rose 14% and sales in Europe were up 18.1%.翻译:9月份国内销量猛增20.5%，美国销量增长14%，欧洲销量增长18.1%。

In contrast, output and sales in Thailand, Indonesia and Vietnam fell in September due to tougher economic conditions.翻译:相比之下，由于经济形势严峻，泰国、印度尼西亚和越南9月份产量和销量均出现下降。

In China, the world's biggest auto market, Toyota reported a nearly 7% decline in production even as it reported slightly higher year-on-year sales.翻译:在全球最大的汽车市场中国，丰田公布的销量同比略有上升，但产量却下降了近7%。

item.title: 美国州参议员在香港非法持有枪支罪被判无罪
item.description:
A Hong Kong court acquitted U.S. State Senator Jeff Wilson of illegally possessing a firearm in the Chinese-ruled city as long as he doesn't commit any crime for the next two years.翻译:香港一家法院宣判美国州参议员杰夫·威尔逊在香港非法持有枪支罪名不成立，只要他在未来两年内不犯罪。

Wilson, a member of the Washington State Senate representing the 19th district, was arrested in Hong Kong on Oct. 21 when he arrived at the airport with a pistol in his carry-on luggage. A Republican party member, he has served in the state senate since 2021 and is also a Port of Longview Commissioner.翻译:代表第19选区的华盛顿州参议院议员威尔逊于10月21日在香港被捕，当时他在随身行李中携带手枪，抵达机场。作为一名共和党成员，他自 2021 年以来一直在州参议院任职，同时也是朗维尤港专员。

Hong Kong Principal Magistrate Don So acquitted Wilson of illegal firearms possession and ordered to pay a cash fee of HKD$2,000 ($256), along with the "bind-over order" that requires Wilson to engage in good behaviour and keep the peace for two years.翻译:香港首席裁判官苏东（Don So）宣判威尔逊非法持有枪支罪名不成立，并被责令支付 2,000 港元（256 美元）的现金费用，以及要求威尔逊在两年内行为良好并维持治安的“约束令” 。

So said he was inclined to believe that Wilson did not deliberately break the law.翻译:所以说他倾向于相信威尔逊并没有故意违法。

"This is not the first time he came to Hong Kong or China, he used to be a trade delegate to Hong Kong and China. He should have known that the scrutiny in Hong Kong and China is strict," So said.翻译:“这不是他第一次来香港或中国，他曾经是香港和中国的贸易代表。他应该知道香港和中国的审查很严格，”苏说。

Wilson was travelling with his wife on the first leg of a five week vacation in Southeast Asia. He did a self declaration of arms at customs and he brought a revolver by mistake, the court was told.翻译:威尔逊与妻子一起前往东南亚进行五周假期的第一站。法庭被告知，他在海关进行了自我武器申报，并错误地携带了一把左轮手枪。

He did not realise his pistol was in his briefcase when he passed through airport security in Portland in the U.S. and baggage screeners failed to detect it, he said in a statement on his website.翻译:他在自己网站上的一份声明中表示，当他通过美国波特兰机场安检时，他并没有意识到自己的手枪在公文包里，而且行李安检机也没有发现它。

The weapon was discovered mid-flight between San Francisco and Hong Kong, when he reached into his briefcase for a piece of gum and felt his unloaded revolver inside, the statement said.翻译:声明称，这件武器是在旧金山和香港之间的飞行途中发现的，当时他伸手到公文包里取出一块口香糖，摸到里面有一把已卸下子弹的左轮手枪。

Carrying a firearm without a license in Hong Kong is illegal and offenders can face up to HK$100,000 ($12,800) and a maximum of 14 years in prison.翻译:在香港无证携带枪支是违法的，违法者最高可面临 100,000 港元（12,800 美元）的罚款和最高 14 年的监禁。

Reporting by Dorothy Kam; writing by Farah Master; Editing by James Pomfret and Christian Schmollinger翻译:多萝西·卡姆 (Dorothy Kam) 报道；法拉大师撰写；詹姆斯·庞弗雷特和克里斯蒂安·施莫林格编辑

item.title: 亚洲足球周
item.description:
Talking points from the week in Asian football:翻译:本周亚洲足球的谈话要点：

SHANGHAI PORT WIN CHINESE TITLE AFTER VOLATILE SHANDONG DRAW

Shanghai Port claimed the Chinese Super League title for the first time since 2018 on Sunday, drawing 1-1 with nearest rivals Shandong Taishan in a bad-tempered clash at Pudong Stadium that featured five red cards.翻译:周日，上海港队在浦东体育场与实力最接近的对手山东泰山队进行了一场激烈的交锋，双方共领到五张红牌，自2018年以来首次夺得中超联赛冠军。

Lu Wenjun put Shanghai ahead from close range in the 16th minute but was then sent off four minutes before the interval for a second bookable offence.翻译:第16分钟，吕文君近距离射门帮助上海取得领先，但在中场休息前4分钟因第二次犯规被罚下场。

His expulsion sparked angry scenes that resulted in Shandong's Moises and Cai Huikang also been sent off, while Port coach Javier Pereira also saw red.翻译:他的被驱逐引发了愤怒的场面，导致山东队的莫伊塞斯和蔡惠康也被罚下场，而港口队主教练哈维尔·佩雷拉也被红牌罚下。

Shandong substitute Fei Nanduo was the next to be dismissed 15 minutes from time and, although Xie Wenneng equalised a minute from time, Shanghai held on to clinch the title with one game remaining.翻译:比赛还剩15分钟时，山东替补球员费南多被罚下场，尽管谢文能在比赛还剩一分钟时扳平比分，但上海队在还剩一场的情况下锁定了冠军。

SECOND HALF SHOW SEES ULSAN COMPLETE K-LEAGUE TITLE DEFENCE

Ulsan Hyundai clinched the K-League title on Sunday with a 2-0 win over Daegu FC to ensure the defending champions retained the crown won last year.翻译:蔚山现代队周日以2比0击败大邱F​​C队，夺得K联赛冠军，确保卫冕冠军卫冕冠军。

Ulsan's win coupled with a 1-1 draw for second-placed Pohang Steelers meant Hong Myung-bo's side opened up a 10-point gap over their nearest rivals with three games remaining in the campaign.翻译:蔚山的胜利加上 1-1 战平排名第二的浦项制铁队，意味着洪明甫的球队在联赛还剩 3 场比赛时，与最接近的对手拉开了 10 分的差距。

Kim Min-hyeok gave Ulsan the lead with a 69th minute header and Jang Si-yong put the result beyond doubt in the final minute when he slotted his shot through goalkeeper Oh Seung-hoon's legs.翻译:金珉赫在第 69 分钟头球破门，为蔚山取得领先，张时勇在最后一分钟射门，穿过门将吴承勋的腿，让比赛结果毫无疑问。

ANDERSON LOPES BRACES SEES YOKOHAMA MOVE CLOSER TO SUMMIT

Yokohama F Marinos closed to within two points of J.League leaders Vissel Kobe on Saturday after Kevin Muscat's defending champions handed Avispa Fukuoka a 4-0 defeat.翻译:周六，凯文·穆斯卡特的卫冕冠军福冈黄蜂队以 4-0 击败横滨水手队后，横滨水手队与 J.League 领头羊神户胜利船的差距缩小到两分。

Anderson Lopes scored twice in the opening 25 minutes before further goals from Asahi Uenaka and Ryo Miyaichi confirmed the points for Marinos.翻译:安德森·洛佩斯在开场 25 分钟就梅开二度，随后上中朝日和宫市亮的进球证实了水手队的得分。

Kobe's lead was cut after Takayuki Yoshida's team were held to a 1-1 draw by Shonan Bellmare, with Yuya Osako equalising from the penalty spot in the 53rd minute for the league leaders to score his 21st goal of the campaign.翻译:吉田贵之的球队被湘南贝尔马雷以 1-1 逼平后，神户的领先优势被缩小，第 53 分钟，大迫雄也通过点球扳平比分，为联赛领头羊攻入了本赛季的第 21 粒进球。

MITROVIC ON TARGET AS AL-HILAL REMAIN ON TOP IN SAUDI

Aleksandar Mitrovic scored again as Al-Hilal maintained their lead in the Saudi Pro League with a 3-1 win over Al-Ahli on Saturday.翻译:周六，亚历山大·米特罗维奇再次进球，帮助阿尔希拉尔队以 3-1 战胜阿尔阿赫利队，继续在沙特职业联赛中保持领先。

The former Fulham striker doubled his side's advantage in the 37th minute to net his eighth of the season after Sergej Milinkovic-Savic had given Al-Hilal a first minute lead.翻译:这位前富勒姆前锋在第 37 分钟将球队的优势扩大了一倍，在谢尔盖·米林科维奇-萨维奇 (Sergej Milinkovic-Savic) 在第一分钟为阿尔希拉尔 (Al-Hilal) 取得领先后，打进了本赛季的第八个进球。

Al-Hilal hold a four point advantage over Al-Nassr, who beat Al-Fayha 3-1 to climb above Al-Taawon into second place with Anderson Talisca scoring twice for Luis Castro's team.翻译:Al-Hilal 领先 Al-Nassr 4 分，后者以 3-1 击败 Al-Fayha，超越 Al-Taawon 升至第二位，安德森·塔利斯卡 (Anderson Talisca) 为路易斯·卡斯特罗 (Luis Castro) 队梅开二度。

URAWA UNDER PRESSURE AFTER ASIAN CHAMPIONS LEAGUE DEFEAT

Title holders Urawa Red Diamonds slipped to a 2-0 loss against Pohang Steelers in the Asian Champions League on Wednesday to put their hopes of a place in the last 16 in doubt.翻译:卫冕冠军浦和红钻周三在亚冠联赛中以 2-0 输给浦项制铁，让他们进入 16 强的希望受到质疑。

Urawa are second in Group J, five points behind Pohang and level with China's Wuhan Three Towns, with only the winners guaranteed to advance to the knockout rounds.翻译:浦和在J组排名第二，落后浦项5分，与中国的武汉三镇持平，只有胜者才能晋级淘汰赛。

Pohang, Al-Ain of the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Pro League side Al-Nassr, Bangkok United and Japan's Kawasaki Frontale are the only teams with perfect records as the group phase reached the halfway point.翻译:浦项、阿联酋艾因、沙特职业联赛球队阿尔纳斯尔、曼谷联队和日本川崎前锋队是小组赛过半时仅有的战绩完美的球队。

Reporting by Michael Church, Editing by Michael Perry翻译:迈克尔·丘奇报道，迈克尔·佩里编辑
